channel.title: How would i host a server that could hold alot of people
channel.description: i already have a good server and it can run about 30 -40 people off my computer but i need it to be able to hold more

item.title: How would i host a server that could hold alot of people
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“Danny068, post:2, topic:151457”]How do you mean hold more? What happens when it oges above 30-40?[/quote]It auto crashes,It happened to old sources like Zamorakscape and pur3pk3r scape…You can edit the number of max players in client.java…not sure
